pr_title: Add NodeConfigCollector to collect node configs(threadpool capacity etc.) from ES

timeline.message: Add NodeConfigurationRca to collect threadpool config settings from each node

timeline.bodyText: Please add a javadoc for this class
timeline.author: yojs

timeline.bodyText: Let's add a javadoc stating how we are operating on the FlowUnits
timeline.author: yojs

timeline.bodyText: Can you briefly describe the rationale of using an RCA node for this ? Do you think it would be cleaner if we add a new node type called ESConfigNode ?
timeline.author: yojs

replies.bodyText:
@yojs are you suggesting that this should be different kind a NonLeafNode and not extend from RCA. With a FlowUnit that is more tuned to node configurations?
I think that is cleaner in general. Will need changes to PersistorBase logic which needs to be refactored anyway to work with non flow units that are not from RCAs. It can be picked separately.
replies.author: vigyasharma

replies.bodyText: Created a new type of node EsConfigNode and extend the class as PerformanceControllerConfigCollector
replies.author: rguo-aws

timeline.message: Create a separate node type EsConfigNode to collect ES config settings

timeline.bodyText: I was actually thinking of having a custom flow unit for this type of node. It doesn't really fit into the nested HotNodeSummary and HotResourceSummary lists - the terms healthy/unhealthy do not apply to a given queue capacity conf. The new flow unit could be simply have resource and values for those resources (for each node).
timeline.author: vigyasharma

replies.bodyText: Agree. that is actually what I am planing to do. but that requires refactoring in base cluster RCA. (i.e. need to create a base node level summary and extend it to something like EsConfigFlowunit). At this moment, we still have to add this to the HotNodeSummary so that it can be parsed by the cluster level RCA.  I will create an issue and refactor it altogether.
replies.author: rguo-aws

replies.bodyText: Add NodeConfigFlowUnit as a new type of Flowunit to carry node config settings across RCA graph
replies.author: rguo-aws

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't the NodeConfig use its own summary such as NodeConfigSummary ?
timeline.author: yojs

replies.bodyText: the problem of creating its own summary is this summary needs to be sent over to gRPC so we have to create a separate protobuf message for that. It would be better to keep the protobuf message as is to avoid duplicated code and create a new flowunit type as a wrapper to read/write config settings
replies.author: rguo-aws
